title: Exploring the Impact of Vocal Enthusiasm Effects in Multimedia Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational computer science concepts
context.additional_context: Learners listen to computer algorithm explanations in a VR-equipped simulation environment and participate in learning activities via personal devices under a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) approach.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish social perceptual differences between enthusiastic and calm vocal presentations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the impact of vocal expression styles on cognitive load with three or more specific examples.
Learners can analyze the effect of vocal enthusiasm on transfer performance in multimedia learning environments based on experimental data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
